title: bestrading
author: bestrading
content: XMON is the official token of 0xmons NFTs, which are scarce, digital collectibles on the Ethereum blockchain, and are tradable at OpenSea. They are inspired by a combination of Pokemon, SCP, and Lovecraft.XMON launched in early 2021, and had an All Time High value of $100,348.53 per coin on November 16, 2021. At the time of writing, the Circulating Supply of XMON is 1,495, and the Total and Maximum Supply is 10,000 XMON, making XMON among the scarce cryptocurrencies available. XMON is listed under the "AI & Big Data‚Äù category on CoinMarketCap, which hints that this token could imminently outperform various regular alt-coins, as Artificial Intelligence has recently been gaining extensive popularity within the cryptocurrency industry.Currently, XMON could be accumulated through Coinbase Self-Custody Wallet, Uniswap V2 and V3, Poloniex, Bitget, BKEX, Bilaxy, DigiFinex. Various other Cryptocurrency Exchanges are projected to have XMON available to trade in the near future, including GateIO, which already holds over 8 XMON tokens, and is a Top-30 token holder of XMON.------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------For more information about XMON, please check out the CoinMarketCap stats of this token.

comments.author: bestrading
comments.body: Once XMON reaches back to its average value of $40k or more per token, wise XMON investors will be happy and enjoy themselves and receive loads of pleasure from their riches, by buying expensive stuff and having ability to do everything they desire! ü§°

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Why did you not write about the reason why the token price dumped from $25k to $4k after the launch of Sudo tokens. This is what you get when you try to attach value to a price of tokens by staking it for another token, once the new tokens are released it becomes a game of who is the first out of the gate, the project and the team behind it are very sound no doubt about this but will need real work to drive value back to the tokens with so many people already waiting for the price to go up and dump on the market

comments.author: bestrading
comments.body: Quote from: jacafbiz on March 07, 2023, 05:11:06 PMWhy did you not write about the reason why the token price dumped from $25k to $4k after the launch of Sudo tokens. This is what you get when you try to attach value to a price of tokens by staking it for another token, once the new tokens are released it becomes a game of who is the first out of the gate, the project and the team behind it are very sound no doubt about this but will need real work to drive value back to the tokens with so many people already waiting for the price to go up and dump on the marketWell, hunny, this is now a perfect opportunity to BUY more and more XMON at laughable low levels, because once it reaches back to $50k and up per XMON value, it would be much harder for an average Joe to stack up on some solid values of XMON tokens!!!
